alexwilton.handwritingAssistant.exercises

Class RecapExercise

  • java.lang.Object
    • alexwilton.handwritingAssistant.exercises.Exercise
      • alexwilton.handwritingAssistant.exercises.RecapExercise

  • public class RecapExercise
extends Exercise
    Recap Exercise gives the leaner the opportunity to reattempted writing words which they failed to form correctly. Words for reattempted are ordered with the words with the highest fail frequency first and lowest fail frequency last.

    • Field Summary

      Order List of Words which the learner failed to write in previous exercises.

    • Method Detail

      • sortWordFails

        private void sortWordFails()
        Sort Words with the highest fail frequency first and lowest fail frequency last. Result is stored in orderedWordFails List.

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
        Draw Recap Exercise. Draws exercise type, instruction, lines, words to copy and visual feedback for learner.
        Overrides:

        Parameters:

        public boolean hasAnotherPage()
        Are there more words to show than are currently being shown on displayed recap page.
        Returns:
